Lettings

App to manage lettings and address

get lettings list

To retrieve the lettings’ list, you can use the letting.index() function:

letting.index(request)

Return the list of lettings.

Parameters:

request (request) – automatically filled with url “lettings/”

Returns:

The index template with all lettings.

Return type:

view

get a letting

To retrieve a letting information, you can use the letting() function:

letting(request, letting_id)

Return a letting detail, with letting title and letting address

Parameters:

  • request (request) – automatically filled with url “lettings/<letting_id>/”

  • letting_id (int()) – id of selected letting

Returns:

The letting template with letting object.

Return type:

view
